scripts.test-dev: echo 'Running On DEV env' && cross-env runEnv=dev npx playwright test
scripts.test-dev-headed: echo 'Running On DEV env' && cross-env runEnv=dev npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test-qa: echo 'Running On QA env' && cross-env runEnv=qa npx playwright test
scripts.test-qa-headed: echo 'Running On QA env' && cross-env runEnv=qa npx playwright test --headed
